```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tab200=read.table('exon200_gcf.cf.stat',header=TRUE)
tab14k=read.table('exon14k_gcf.cf.stat',header=TRUE)
```


```{r}
tab200 <- tab200 %>% mutate(data = "exon200_mf")
tab14k <- tab14k %>% mutate(data = "exon14k_ref")

gcf_data <- bind_rows(tab200, tab14k)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gcf_data, aes(x = data, y = gCF, fill = data))+
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
ggplot(gcf_data, aes( x = gCF, color = data))+
  geom_density()
```
